titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on cyan 1 RO inkjet printing ink.
A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on cyan 1 RO inkjet printing ink.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant temporarily duty-free treatment of cyan 1 RO inkjet printing ink.
